name: Object Detection
description: Identify and locate objects within an image, drawing bounding boxes around each detected item for clarity.
usecase: Used in autonomous vehicles, surveillance systems, and object tracking applications.
challenges: Challenges include handling occlusions, scale variations, and object localization accuracy.
popular_methods: Common methods include region-based convolutional neural networks (R-CNN), You Only Look Once (YOLO), and Single Shot MultiBox Detector (SSD).
